title: Warring Kingdoms Nidalee

replies.body:
Thank you KateyKhaos for considering my post and replying. I am in fact Chinese, so it just felt a little off! Thanks 

{{item:2140}} {{item:3159}}

Hey ColorfulRainbows!

Warring Kingdoms Nidalee's Hunted icon was changed back to the base from the red icon because we felt that it read as a bleed, which, as you probably know, isn't the case. 

Keep in mind that all work done on PBE has the possibility to change, which, in a lot of cases, content goes through several changes, before reaching its final version on live. :] 

Hope that clears things up!
Didn't Dragon Slayer Braum get his red symbol back after you decided it's not a problem? Why the same issue again?

Because Riot has to make skins for the idiots that play this game, and therefore we can't have things looking TOO similar. I mean, if Dark Valkyrie Diana kept her helmet, I might not be able to differentiate between the floating lady with balls orbiting her and the lady with the giant blade until they kill me for the first time!
